I am a Consultant for Economics and Data Science at The World Bank in Kosovo and Austria. This page serves as a portfolio of my personal data projects. I am also open to collaboration, so if you're interested or have any inquiries, feel free to reach out via email. When not innovating on data platforms, I enjoy spending time hiking and running. 

## Work Experience

**The World Bank** \| Prishtina, Kosovo & Vienna, Austria<br> *Economist & Data Scientist* \| March 2023 - Present

**UNICEF** \| Prishtina, Kosovo<br> *Consultant for Data & Statistics* \| August 2021 - February 2022

**GAP Institute** \| Prishtina, Kosovo<br> **Researcher** \| August 2019 - August 2021

## Education
